function.name: loaddata
function.description: Returns a string variable containing the text of the local file uri. The optional parameter encoding sets the text encoding to use. It defaults to ‘UTF-8’. When encoding is set to to ‘BINARY’, the file is loaded into a binary variable, which can be then be used to e.g. calculate the md5.
